WoWPaladin:GrandCrusaderPower.NAME: Grand Crusader
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of every round, gain #b 5 #yHoly.

DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of every round, retain cards equal to your #yHoly.

WoWPaladin:ConsecrationPower.NAME: Consecration
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, deal damage to each enemy equal to the number of cards in your hand.

WoWPaladin:PurgePower.NAME: Purge
DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw a curse, exhaust it and gain #b
